Package org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DatasetDeletionService
    Describes a service dedicated to the sole purpose of deleting all occurrences for an entire dataset.
    FragmentPersistenceService
    A service for writing and retrieving Fragments.
    OccurrenceKeyPersistenceService
    This service manages the secondary index that links unique identifiers (either holy triplet or publisher-provided unique ids) to GBIF-generated occurrence keys (integers).
    OccurrencePersistenceService
    A convenience interface to avoid exposing writing and other, expensive methods at the public api level.
    OccurrenceWriter
    An interface to govern the updating and deleting of Occurrences.
    VerbatimOccurrencePersistenceService
    An interface to govern the creating and updating of VerbatimOccurrence objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Fragment
    Represents an occurrence "fragment" from one of our publishers, either XML from any of our supported schemas (listed in OccurrenceSchemaType) or JSON from a DarwinCore Archive.
    FragmentCreationResult
    The result of attempting to insert a new Fragment.
    KeyLookupResult
    Wraps the result of looking up an Occurrence key in order to provide information on whether the key was created for this request or not.
    VerbatimOccurrence
    Represents the "verbatim" view of an occurrence.
    VerbatimOccurrence.Builder  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Fragment.FragmentType
